programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Time's Arrow (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 After Data learns of his own death in late-19th-century San Francisco, a freak accident transports him back to that period.

programme.title: Star Trek Day 2023: Celebrating Star Trek - Star Trek Day 2023: Celebrating Star Trek
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jerry O'Connell (Star Trek: Lower Decks) hosts a celebration of all things Star Trek, including 50 years of animation in the final frontier and a look at Star Trek: Discovery, the modern age of Star Trek, and much more!

programme.title: Star Trek Day 2023: Celebrating Star Trek - Star Trek Day 2023: Celebrating Star Trek
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jerry O'Connell (Star Trek: Lower Decks) hosts a celebration of all things Star Trek, including 50 years of animation in the final frontier and a look at Star Trek: Discovery, the modern age of Star Trek, and much more!

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Man Trap
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Kirk and his crew are at deadly risk from an alien creature that feeds on the salt in a human body and can take on any form.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Charlie "X"
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A powerful teenage boy wreaks havoc aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Where No Man Has Gone Before
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Kirk's friend, Gary Mitchell, is transformed into a God-like entity.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Naked Time
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 A strange alien substance causes the crew to act out their deepest inhibitions, while the ship plummets out of orbit.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 A transporter malfunction causes Captain Kirk to split into his "good" and "evil" selves, and a landing party will freeze to death if the crew is unable to find a way to merge the two Kirks back together.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Mudd's Women
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 The Enterprise picks up a intergalactic conman, Harry Mudd, and three incredibly beautiful women who harbor a dark secret.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Grounded
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 Mariner enlists her friends on a rogue mission to exonerate her mother, as Captain Freeman faces a military tribunal for the destruction of Pakled Planet. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - The Least Dangerous Game
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 On a tropical paradise planet, Mariner questions Commander Ransom on how he structures his away team. Boimler makes a bold career decision. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Mining The Mind's Mines
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 On a remote science outpost, stone orbs are bringing fantasies to life. Tendi starts her first day as a Senior Science Officer Trainee. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Room For Growth
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 Mariner, Boimler and Tendi clash with their arch-rivals: Delta Shift. The Cerritos engineers go on mandatory relaxation leave. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Reflections
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Mariner and Boimler work the Starfleet recruitment booth at an alien job fair, Rutherford challenges himself. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Hear All, Trust Nothing
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The Cerritos crew unexpectedly spends a day on Deep Space Nine. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - A Mathematically Perfect Redemption
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 A wayward Starfleet ensign struggles to find a path to redemption. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Crisis Point 2: Paradoxus
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 Boimler's holodeck movie sequel tries to live up to the original. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.title: Star Trek: Lower Decks - Trusted Sources
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 A visiting reporter on the Cerritos puts Captain Freeman on edge. Stream Season 4 starting September 7, only on Paramount+.

programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 119 - Nano
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 Officer Madigan is crippled in a mysterious bus crash and the lovely Diana Powers turns into a party animal as RoboCop fights a scientist and an ex-I.R.S. agent using microscopic machines to create the ultimate crime.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 120 - Corporate Raiders
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 The city is rocked by anti-corporate violence as RoboCop and Officer Madigan are assigned to bring in a charming ex-terrorist, but a corrupt union leader and his sultry secretary have other plans.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - In Praise Of Pip
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 An alcoholic bookie regrets that he wasn't a better father to his son, Pip, critically wounded in South Vietnam. A visit to an amusement park gives them both a second chance.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Steel
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 Boxing robot "Battling Maxo" breaks down before the scheduled bout, forcing his manager to take its place.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nightmare at 20,000 Feet
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 Mr. Wilson believes he sees a gremlin on the wing of the commercial aircraft he is taking back home... from the sanitarium, where he has been committed for six months after a mental breakdown during a similar flight.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Kind of a Stopwatch
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Patrick Thomas McNulty, a long-winded and self-absorbed know-it-all, is given a fantastic device which brings literal meaning to the expression "stop the world; I want to get off."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Last Night of a Jockey
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 A dejected jockey wants to be tall.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Living Doll
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 6 Erich is displeased when his wife buys an expensive doll for his step-daughter. He becomes even more displeased when the doll tells him it doesn't like him!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Old Man in the Cave
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 7 A mysterious guardian helps a tiny community survive after the Bomb destroys much of the Earth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Uncle Simon
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 Barbara accidentally causes her cruel Uncle Simon's death. His will stipulates that she must care for his latest invention - a robot. The robot begins to take on Uncle Simon's traits.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E1 - Premiere
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Astronaut John Crichton attempts to propel his module at high speeds but is hit by a radiation wave and is sucked through a wormhole.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E2 - Exodus From Genesis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A locator beacon, automatically broadcasting its exact location to any Peacekeeper forces in the area.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E3 - Back And Back And Back To The Future
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The crew rescues a scientist and his assistant from a disintegrating ship.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E4 - Throne For A Loss
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Rygel is captured and held for ransom by some bounty hunters.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear - The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Final Investment
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a robbery goes bad in south Memphis, one man is dead and very little physical evidence is left at the scene.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After The First 48: Drama at The Classic/50G Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 On October 26, 2008, Birmingham homicide detectives were helping with crowd control at the Magic City Classic--a renowned football game between two of the oldest black colleges in Alabama.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Blackout
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Dallas homicide detective Robert Arredondo was called to his first case as lead detective on in November of 2007.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 On a Sunday night in June 2007, Christian Marton and his girlfriend Monica Stafford drove two hours from Axtell, Texas to Dallas where Christian had arranged to buy a car. By the end of the evening, Christian was dead--shot in a robbery attempt.

programme.title: After the First 48 - The Boogey Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 On March 26th, 2006, homicide detectives were called to the site of a burning car. Inside were the charred remains of 22-year-old Xenia Wilson, the mother of a four-year-old daughter.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Lester Street One Hour Version
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 In September of 2010, Jessie Dotson went on trial for one of the worst mass murders in Memphis history. He wasn't accused of killing strangers--he was brother, friend, and uncle to the six people he'd allegedly murdered.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Final Investment
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a robbery goes bad in south Memphis, one man is dead and very little physical evidence is left at the scene.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 On a Sunday night in June 2007, Christian Marton and his girlfriend Monica Stafford drove two hours from Axtell, Texas to Dallas where Christian had arranged to buy a car. By the end of the evening, Christian was dead--shot in a robbery attempt.

programme.title: After the First 48 - The Boogey Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 On March 26th, 2006, homicide detectives were called to the site of a burning car. Inside were the charred remains of 22-year-old Xenia Wilson, the mother of a four-year-old daughter.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Lester Street One Hour Version
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 In September of 2010, Jessie Dotson went on trial for one of the worst mass murders in Memphis history. He wasn't accused of killing strangers--he was brother, friend, and uncle to the six people he'd allegedly murdered.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Final Investment
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a robbery goes bad in south Memphis, one man is dead and very little physical evidence is left at the scene.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Devil Disguised
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 211 The story of a truly virtuous young victim and how a relentless police and forensics investigation ensured her killer, a true devil on earth, would never escape justice again….

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Shoe Fetish Killer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 212 The compellingly tragic story of a random attack by a perverted killer, and how smart police work and a detailed forensic investigation ultimately led to the person responsible.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Erie County Killer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 213 The investigation into Joan Giambra’s murder, how it became linked to a string of other murders and how the miracle of DNA technology and the persistence of a committed detective solved the crime.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Beverly Ann Dyke
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 214 Police investigated a brutal and senseless murder, and false claims of guilt nearly derailed the investigation but the victim’s family never gave up trying to find the truth and uncover the killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Veiled Killer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 215 The inquiry into the death of David Castor and how an extensive police investigation, fueled with the power of forensics, uncovered another victim and brought the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Whelan Family Murders
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 216 Sharon Whelan and her daughters were attacked and killed in their home on Christmas Eve. A multi-discipline forensics investigation uncovered the killer’s horrific actions and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Imette St. Guillen
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 217 The events leading up to a horrific murder, the large-scale police investigation that identified the killer and how the powerful strands of forensics were able to link the killer to other victims.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Murder in The Mountains
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 218 The story of the brutal death of Phyllis Murphy, how her family never thought they’d see justice, and how after almost two decades, modern forensic technology eventually led police to her murderer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Bare Bones
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 219 The story of a custody battle drove a family apart and how dogged detective work and the revolutionary areas of DNA and cyber forensics eventually solved a seemingly unsolvable crime.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Sick Ripper
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 220 The tragic story of Nilsa Arizmendi, how police tracked down her murderer and how a chance happening and detailed forensics investigation uncovered Connecticut’s most prolific serial killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Ultimate Deception
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 221 The tragic murder of Mary Gough, and despite his attempts to cover his tracks and evade capture, a professional police investigation and extensive forensics, eventually caught up with her killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Buried Alive
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 222 The story of the abduction of Stephanie Slater, the hunt to find her kidnapper and how, by using the science of forensics, police were able to unmask a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Danced with Death
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 223 The story of Shamaia Smith, how she met her death and how relentless detective work and modern forensics solved the mystery of what happened to her.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - It's Only A Paper Moon
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 10 Traumatized by the loss of his leg, Nog retreats to the holographic world of 1960's lounge singer Vic Fontaine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Prodigal Daughter
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 11 When Ezri returns home to investigate O'Brien's disappearance, she uncovers disturbing family secrets.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Emperor's New Cloak
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 12 Quark and Rom risk their lives by crossing into an evil alternate universe to rescue the captive leader of Quark's homeworld.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Field Of Fire
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 13 Ezri summons the suppressed homicidal memories of a previous Dax incarnation in order to solve a series of murders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Chimera
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 14 A nomadic Changeling asks Odo to leave the space station and join his search for their shapeshifting brethren.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Inter Arma Enim Silent Leges
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 15 Bashir becomes an unwitting pawn in a deadly game between Romulan intelligence forces and a covert Starfleet organization.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Badda-Bing Badda-Bang
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 16 A glitch in Vic Fontaine's Holosuite program leads the crew to attempt a daring heist of a mob-run casino.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Penumbra
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 17 While Ezri searches for a missing Worf, Sisko makes plans to marry Kasidy Yates.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - 'Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 18 As Sisko agonizes over his broken engagement, Dukat's latest evil plan is revealed.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Strange Bedfellows
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 19 While Worf and Ezri face execution, an alliance between enemies threatens to turn the tide of the war against the Federation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Changing Face Of Evil
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 20 The war reaches a crucial turning point when the Cardassian leader breaks from the Dominion- Breen alliance.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - When It Rains...
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 21 While Kira consults with Damar's rebel forces, Bashir makes a shocking discovery about the disease ravaging the Founders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Tacking Into The Wind
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 22 Kira masterminds a plot to obtain an enemy weapon, while Worf investigates a dramatic power shift within the Klingon Empire.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.
